RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAPA CHARLES ranged up off a hard used rival on the turn angling out while bidding clear in upper stretch holding sway to wire. LOOKA LOOKA gained on the turn angling to the rail in upper stretch responding with a strong finish. OLD FORTY FIVE a step slow through the turn raced four wide down the lane finishing evenly. PRETTY LOUD slow early played no factor. BUY HERE PAY HERE engaged early would duel from the rail clearing on the turn before wilting in upper stretch. VERRAZANO LEGACY raced evenly off the pace fading in upper stretch. ALLABOUTBIZ pressured hard early then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Buy Here Pay Here
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard used early, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Allaboutbiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: ranged up on turn, angled out, surged clear top lane

ENTRY.NAME: Verrazano Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Loud
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Looka Looka
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on turn, vied from rail lane, finished strong

ENTRY.NAME: Old Forty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 4 wide lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 10100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOT A GAME stalked the pace through the turn angling out in upper stretch coming with a late run getting up on the wire. EL CARDINAL broke sharply setting the pace holding daylight through the turn cutting the corner to draw off in upper stretch digging in late being grabbed on the wire. JULIE'S FERRARI hustled on the outside raced five wide into upper stretch bidding from the mid track gaining some with an even finish. FLIMFLAM MAN sent hard was hustled four wide through the turn moving between horses into upper stretch hanging under a drive. JACKZILLA trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, angled out lane, late run, up last jump

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: James Everatt, Janeane Everatt & Arika Everatt-Meeuse

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled outside, 5 wide into lane, bid evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, cut corner to lane, caught wire

ENTRY.NAME: Jackzilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Flimflam Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, four wide turn, hung lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DADDY Z stalked the pace engaging to lead at the quarter pole shaking clear in upper stretch widening under a drive. TRUST FUND ROBBER stalked the pace racing evenly to upper stretch rallying late to save place. MYSTIC MINISTER away alertly pressed the pace dueling through the turn into upper stretch weakening late on the inside. HICKORY BILL pressed early then faded on the turn. BUILT LIKE TARZAN trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Trust Fund Robber
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, evenly to lane, came on late to save place

ENTRY.NAME: Daddy Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even turn, cleared abreast lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Built Like Tarzan
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Minister
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, dueled on turn, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Hickory Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, faded on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATER DAYS pressured the pace through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch widening under brisk hand urging. WAY TO FIRE chased the pace running up on heels steadying briefly near the seven sixteenths pole angling out on the turn coming on late a clear second best. YO YO MON off slowly lagged early playing no factor. JALEBI BABY pressured the pace dueling through the turn ceding in upper stretch fading along the inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Jalebi Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded to lane, faded inside

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Yo Mon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged to lane, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Later Days
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, shook clear top lane, widened driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Revocable Trust of Dr. Mikel C.Harrington & Patricia O

ENTRY.NAME: Way to Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, in tight 7/16, angled out turn, came on second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Br ed Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WELLMAN stalked the pace bidding clear on the turn widening in upper stretch staying safe to wire. STORMIN ROCKET stalked to upper stretch giving steady response down the lane closing the gap late while securing place. EMJAY slow early lost ground to upper stretch moving up late while seven wide. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR raced evenly lacking more from mid track down the lane. INDIAN EMPIRE faded on the turn. SECRET'S DOUBLE gave hard pursuit through the turn then weakened down the lane. WAR NOVEL was always outrun. POTENTIAL GRIZZLY led early then was passed on the turn folding abruptly in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Potential Grizzly
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, passed turn, folded up

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, closed the gap saving place

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Wellman
ENTRY.OWNER: Brumley, Jerry S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear on turn, drew off top lane, held up

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Emjay
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, moved up late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: War Novel
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret's Double
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased close up through the turn, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less N ot Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMAAZA broke sharply setting the pace on a clear lead through the turn widening in upper stretch winning as much the best. VINTAGE SPARKLE slow early lagged to upper stretch rallying up late to save place. MYRRH hustled along chased through the turn being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch coming up a bit short late. CURT'S ANGEL slow early played no factor. LADY VALENTINA chased through the turn into upper stretch wearing down the final eighth. SWEET BELEN bumped at the break was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, widened lane, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn wore down

ENTRY.NAME: Myrrh
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased to upper stretch weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Sparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, rallied late for place

ENTRY.NAME: Curt's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 83. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less No t Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KADESH sent clear set the pace drawing off to upper stretch being ridden out to the wire. BECKHAM JAMES dropping well back early would fire on the far turn rallying through the lane a clear second best. SKIDSTREAM gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch weakening the final eighth. COLAVITO hustled along through the backside would give way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Beckham James
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early, rallied on the far turn, came on second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Kadesh
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, drew off lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Colavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, gave way far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 23 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWEAQUED stalked the pace wresting the lead on the turn drawing off in upper stretch winning in hand. MOONLIGHT MISS tracked evenly through the turn rallying down the lane coming on for place. LADY MECHANIC slow early lagged to upper stretch mustering a mild rally to move past tired ones. G MONEY LIV broke sharply to the early lead, hooked on the turn would weaken down the lane. MILLIE raced evenly in mid pack proving no factor. ESTA CALIENTE slow early was not involved. SWEET TOOTSIE LU was always outrun. NURSE KATIE raced evenly through the turn fading down the stretch. GOLD PASS raced second flight tiring to upper stretch. WICKED VALENTINE offered little.
